hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Water Temple Compass#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #inside Ganon's Castle#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #2# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Left).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Jail Key# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Blue Rupee#.
